algorithm_technique: Iterate through turns, applying bonus scoring for strikes.
Use a helper function to calculate scores based on strike history.
problem_summary_simple: Calculate bowling scores considering bonus points for strikes in previous turns.
problem_summary_technical: Calculate player scores by iterating through turns, applying double points for strikes in the current or previous two turns.
key_insights: The scoring rule depends on the previous two turns, suggesting a sliding window or look-back approach.
A helper function can abstract the score calculation logic for each player.
Careful handling of indices and strike flags is crucial.
